document_data.mainbody:
Saeval Calaudra was a moon elf rogue and assassin and, as of 1374 DR, was a member of the VelNikeryma.
He offered support and expertise to Eldreth Veluuthra cells across Faer√ªn and introduced people to the VelNikeryma. As of 1374 DR he was the youngest member of the organization.
